Collection.LongName: MODIS/Terra+Aqua Nadir BRDF-Adjusted Reflectance 16-Day L3 Global 1km SIN Grid
Collection.DataSetId: MODIS/Terra+Aqua Nadir BRDF-Adjusted Reflectance 16-Day L3 Global 1km SIN Grid V005
Collection.Description: MODIS/Terra plus Aqua Nadir BRDF-Adjusted Reflectance 16-Day L3 Global 1km SIN Grid
Collection.CitationForExternalPublication: This data set was provided by the NASA EOS Project.

Contact.HoursOfService: M-F, 8 a.m. to 4 p.m. Central Time

Address.StreetAddress: U.S. Geological Survey, Earth Resources Observation and Science (EROS) Center

Characteristic.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristic.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

Characteristic.Name: EquatorCrossingTime
Characteristic.Description: Local time of the equator crossing and direction (ascending or descending)

AdditionalAttribute.Name: ALBEDOFILEID
AdditionalAttribute.Description: ID of the kernel albedo table used.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: BRDFCODEID
AdditionalAttribute.Description: ID of the BRDF/albedo code used.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: HORIZONTALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Horizontal tile number of a grid, which increases from left to right.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: AVERAGENUMBEROBS
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Average number of observations in pixels and tiles that are to be processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PERCENTLANDINTILE
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of land pixels in tile.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: BRDFDATABASEVERSION
AdditionalAttribute.Description: ID of ancillary BRDF database used.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PERCENTNEWBRDFS
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of pixels and bands in tile with new full BRDF inversions.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PERCENTSHAPEFIXEDBRDFS
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of pixels and bands in tile with BRDFs derived from the ancillary database BRDF fitted to the available observations.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PERCENTSUBSTITUTEBRDFS
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of pixels and bands in tile with BRDFs taken from the ancillary BRDF database.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTGOODQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTNOTPRODUCEDOTHER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels not produced due to some reason other than cloud

AdditionalAttribute.Name: QAPERCENTOTHERQUALITY
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percent of pixels with not so good quality

AdditionalAttribute.Name: VERTICALTILENUMBER
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Vertical tile number of a grid, which increases from top to bottom.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PERCENTPROCESSEDINTILE
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Percentage of pixels and bands in tile that were processed.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: SETUPFILEID
AdditionalAttribute.Description: ID of the BRDF/albedo model definition file used.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: PROCESSVERSION
AdditionalAttribute.Description: Version of the process software that generated the product.

AdditionalAttribute.Name: TileID
AdditionalAttribute.Description: MODIS Land tile identification number which represents a geographical area on the surface of the Earth bounded by latitude and longitude coordinates.

OnlineResource.Description: Data set landing page at the LP DAAC
